statements: SELECT * FROM Recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM Recipes WHERE cooking_time > 30;
SELECT recipe_id, instructions FROM Recipes WHERE posted_by = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM Recipes ORDER BY cooking_time DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, posted_by FROM Recipes ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, cooking_time, instructions, posted_by FROM Recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM Recipes WHERE posted_by = 'Alice' ORDER BY cooking_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Recipes WHERE cooking_time > 30 AND posted_by = 'Bob' ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT recipe_id, instructions FROM Recipes WHERE cooking_time IS NOT NULL AND recipe_id IN (2, 3, 5);
SELECT recipe_name, posted_by FROM Recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%Pasta%' OR cooking_time < 20 ORDER BY posted_by ASC, cooking_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, serves FROM recipes WHERE cooking_time < 30;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM recipes WHERE serves > 4 ORDER BY cooking_time DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM recipes JOIN ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = ingredients.recipe_id;
SELECT DISTINCT serves FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%Pasta%';
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE cooking_time < 30
SELECT recipe_name, serves FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM recipes JOIN ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = ingredients.recipe_id
SELECT * FROM ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT recipe_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM recipes JOIN ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = ingredients.recipe_id GROUP BY recipes.recipe_id
SELECT * FROM recipes
SELECT recipe_name, preparation_time, cooking_time FROM recipes
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, servings FROM recipes WHERE preparation_time > 30
SELECT ingredient_name, amount FROM ingredients WHERE recipe_id = 1 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT instruction_id, step_number, instruction_text FROM instructions ORDER BY step_number
SELECT recipe_name, preparation_time, servings FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE preparation_time > 30 ORDER BY recipe_name ASC
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, amount FROM recipes INNER JOIN ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = ingredients.recipe_id ORDER BY recipe_name DESC, ingredient_name ASC
SELECT instruction_id, instruction_text FROM instructions WHERE recipe_id = 2 ORDER BY step_number ASC
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE cooking_time < 60 AND servings >= 4
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC;
SELECT recipe_id, ingredient_id FROM recipe_ingredients WHERE recipe_id = 2;
SELECT method_name, description FROM cooking_methods WHERE method_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM recipes
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM recipes
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1
SELECT recipe_name FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY cooking_time ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT recipe_name, servings FROM recipes WHERE servings > 4 ORDER BY recipe_name DESC
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM recipes JOIN ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = ingredients.recipe_id WHERE ingredient_name = 'Tomato'
SELECT MAX(cooking_time) as max_cooking_time FROM recipes
SELECT category_name, COUNT(recipe_id) AS num_recipes FROM categories JOIN recipe_categories ON categories.category_id = recipe_categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY num_recipes DESC
SELECT recipe_name, servings FROM recipes WHERE cooking_time > 30 ORDER BY recipe_name ASC

SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM recipes INNER JOIN ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = ingredients.recipe_id WHERE ingredients.quantity LIKE '%cup%' ORDER BY recipe_name ASC, ingredient_name DESC
SELECT recipe_name, instruction FROM recipes INNER JOIN instructions ON recipes.recipe_id = instructions.recipe_id WHERE instructions.step_number = 1
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name ASC

SELECT recipe_name, category_name FROM recipes INNER JOIN recipe_categories ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_categories.recipe_id INNER JOIN categories ON recipe_categories.category_id = categories.category_id ORDER BY recipe_name DESC, category_name ASC
